Notes(tmp): Only opened in January 2020. This facility is built next door to a Vocational and Technical school that was, until April 2020, funded by the World Bank. It has 14m high walls with 10m tall watchtowers and 13 five storey tall residential complexes. We estimate that this facility has the capacity to detain roughly 10,000 people.
